page.title: 12Farming, Contd.
page.content: Capel Hall Farm, Trimley St. Martin (Tenanted) is wholly arable producing Wheat, Barley, Sugar Beet, Beans and Oil Seed Rape. Four men are employed. At Swiss Farm, Falkenham, there is an intensive pig herd. These are all sold as weaners. Deben Lodge Farm, Falkenham consists of land both north and south of the King's Fleet, part of which is used for irrigation purposes. The farm is a mixed farm operated from Laurel Farm which lies just outside the area concerned.The crops grown are barley, wheat, oil seed rape, also maize and grass, silage for stock, sheep and beef cattle raised outside the area concerned. Falkenham Hall Farm is the only farm within the area owned by Kirton Lodge Estate, which also owns several other farms to the north and west.
